Package index

All functions

AddExample()
Add an example to an existing power plot
ArraySlicer()
Cut Slice From Array
Example()
Find Combination of Parameters Yielding Desired Value (typically power).
FindTarget()
Find Target Power or Other Value
GetPowergrid()
Get core element from powCal or powEx object
GridPlot()
Plot Combinations of Parameters for Achieving Target
PowerDF()
Transform power_array into power_df
PowerGrid()
Evaluate Function (iteratively) at Grid of Input Arguments
PowerPlot()
Create Power Plot
PrintDashes()
Draw a line of dashes, or something else with a certain width.
PrintWrap()
Wrap text in printed output.
Refine()
Refine or Extend Power Array
ScaleRange()
Scale to desired range
SummarizeSims()
Summary of object that has simulations saved.
